top_comments.comment: Well, we have to admit that Chucky is way sexier than Dave

comments_since_last_sample.body: the high note at the end really caught me off guard. but it sounded really cool aswell
A whole new level of awesomesauce
You and this song was definitely made for each other Wow! 😯😍
See you in the gym brother 😂😂😂😂
I bet Dave is gutted, replaced by a doll 😂

Great job as always. The acting really was on point this time 🤣. Felt the need to watch both Tarzan and the old chucky movie again tonight. Wierd I know, but Phil Collins is just like that for me. Looking forward to the next one 😋
Violet, that's just creepy. Strangely hot, but creepy.

Some of the production values utilised in your videos are better than a lot mainstream tv shows!
Add to that your talent and presence all in all make for enjoyable viewing - lovin it!
At 3:12 the dog looking at Violet and Chucky like WTF??!!!
The song been my favorite since listening to Phil  Collins  original song you did wonderful with the song dark and Gothic love it

Well, this was astonishing!

First, I love your interpretation of the song.

Second, that video is freaky af, and I don't know whether to be jealous of Chucky or run screaming!
I liked the song, until there was no drum solo
